                        <div class='gform_body'><ul id='gform_fields_23' class='gform_fields top_label form_sublabel_below description_below'><li id='field_23_1'  class='gfield gfield_contains_required field_sublabel_below field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible' ><label class='gfield_label gfield_label_before_complex'  >My name<span class='gfield_required'>*</span></label><div class='ginput_complex ginput_container no_prefix has_first_name no_middle_name has_last_name no_suffix gf_name_has_2 ginput_container_name' id='input_23_1'>

Official<span class='gfield_required'>*</span></label><div class='ginput_container ginput_container_select'><select name='input_27' id='input_23_27' class='medium gfield_select'   aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false"><option value='' selected='selected'>select your unit</option><option value='5679' >Chancellor officials</option><option value='5680' >Provost officials</option><option value='5681' >VC Admin Services officials</option><option value='5682' >VC Advancement officials</option><option value='5683' >VC Health Affairs officials</option><option value='6548' >VC Innovation officials</option><option value='5684' >VC PGA</option><option value='5685' >VC Research Officials</option><option value='5686' >VC Student Affairs officials</option></select></div></li><li id='field_23_14'  class='gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_below field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible' ><div style="border-color:#1c46a5; padding: 5px 10px 10px 10px; width: 66%; border: 5px solid #00C;">


<p><strong>Announcement (standard)</strong></p>

<p>Announcements are paid promotional messages that are posted to the UIC Today site. They are restricted to events on campus or sponsored by campus units. Announcements can be submitted by anyone with a UIC email for a fee of <strong>$125</strong>.</p>
</div>
</li><li id='field_23_29'  class='gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_below field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible' ><div style="border-color:#1c46a5; padding: 5px 10px 10px 10px; width: 66%; border: 5px solid #00C;">


<p><strong>Research Studies Announcements</strong></p>

<p>Research Studies Announcements are paid promotional messages that are posted to the UIC Today site. They are restricted to events on campus or sponsored by campus units. Announcements can be submitted by anyone with a UIC email for a fee of <strong>$125</strong>.</p>
</div></li><li id='field_23_15'  class='gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_below field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible' ><div style="border-color:#1c46a5; padding: 5px 10px 10px 10px; width: 66%; border: 5px solid #00C;">

<p><strong>Official massmails</strong></p>

<p>Official university communications are reserved for messages from university administrative offices such as the University President, Chancellor, Provost or other Vice Chancellors. Selecting "Official" does not guarantee official processing. If your message is found inappropriate for Official use, you will be asked to provide a CFOAP number for billing as a standard web Announcement. Please send questions about Official messages to <a href="publicaffairs@uic.edu">publicaffairs@uic.edu</a>.</p>

<p>All Official messages are processed at no charge to the requesting department.</p>


</div></li><li id='field_23_16'  class='gfield gfield_html gfield_html_formatted gfield_no_follows_desc field_sublabel_below field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible' ><div style="border-color:#1c46a5; padding: 5px 10px 10px 10px; width: 66%; border: 5px solid #00C;">


<p><strong>DDDH</strong></p>

<p>DDDH email communications are sent to UIC Deans, Directors, and Department Heads for a flat fee of $35. Administrative-related messages only, please. </p>

<p>We are unable to attach files to DDDH email communications. We can, however, upload a file to the server and place a download link in the message body.</p>


</div>
</li><li id='field_23_17'  class='gfield gfield_contains_required field_sublabel_below field_description_below gfield_visibility_visible' ><label class='gfield_label' for='input_23_17' >Post the announcement on this date<span class='gfield_required'>*</span></label><div class='ginput_container ginput_container_date'>
